module.name: Idepix Algorithms
module.description: Idepix algorithms module. Idepix is a generic pixel identification and classification algorithm for optical Earth observation sensors.
module.changelog:
Version 2.2.45: Fixed flag shifting which was introduced in v2.2.44 Version 2.2.44: Dark glint threshold now as separate user options for cloud sure and cloud ambiguous in MODIS part Version 2.2.43: Added NN thresholds as user option in MODIS part Version 2.2.42: Supports sea ice edge computation noq also from L3 product on latlon grid Version 2.2.41: Added mode in OC-CCI algorithm to detect sea ice edge from L3 sea ice product Version 2.2.40: Fixed a flag shifting introduced in v2.2.38-SNAPSHOT (cloud shadow flag was overwritten by cloud buffer) Version 2.2.39: Added user option to write CTP band to Idepix product Version 2.2.38: Fixes and cleanup of Rad2Refl conversion usage Version 2.2.37: Fixes and cleanup in MERIS sea ice detection proposed by M.Paperin Version 2.2.36: Implemented new sea ice detection proposed by M.Paperin Version 2.2.35: Disabled new haze flag in Proba-V cloud classification Version 2.2.34: Revised Proba-V cloud classification Version 2.2.33: Added new Schiller NN in OC-CCI sea ice algorithm Version 2.2.32: Fixed cloud sure/ambiguous separation in Landsat8 algorithm Version 2.2.31: Introduced VIIRS instrument in OC-CCI algorithm Version 2.2.30: Introduced post-processing for VGT in GlobAlbedo algorithm Version 2.2.29: Taken AATSR back on board in GlobAlbedo algorithm Version 2.2.28: Fix in post-processing in Proba-V algorithm Version 2.2.22 - 2.2.27: Several neural nets for OC-CCI MERIS sea ice, various Proba-V refinements Version 2.2.21: Use NN instead of MDSI test in MERIS sea ice approach; write cloud_prob and meris_1600 to target product Version 2.2.20: Improved radiance-to-BT conversion in AVHRR USGS in Avhrr-Ac algorithm Version 2.2.19: Improved PROBA-V support in Globalbedo algorithm Version 2.2.18: Extended PROBA-V support in Globalbedo algorithm (postprocessing) Version 2.2.17: Started PROBA-V support in Globalbedo algorithm (GK/JM) Version 2.2.16: Completely renewed snow/ice classification for AVHRR (GK/JM) Version 2.2.15: Added MERIS support in OC-CCI algorithm to prepare for new MERIS/AATSR-based seaice classification. Version 2.2.14: Extending AVHRR algorithm. Version 2.2.13: Support for SeaWiFS L1C in OC-CCI algorithm. Version 2.2.12: Re-activated Schiller NN output in CC algorithm. Version 2.2.11: Added Neural Net for cloud screening on Landsat8. Version 2.2.10: Version 2.2.9: Version 2.2.8: Version 2.2.7: Version 2.2.6: Version 2.2.5: Version 2.2.4: Version 2.2.3: Version 2.2.2:
Improvements of cloud tests and performance for Landsat 8. Version 2.1.2: Version 2.1.5:
Merged latest EVOLUTION changes into master branch, i.e. algorithms for new sensors (AVHRR, MODIS, SeaWIFS). Version 2.1.2:
Uses an updated BEAM MERIS Radiometry module (bug fix in case of very bright nearly saturated pixels).
Version 2.1.1:
Initial public release for BEAM 5. Previous releases were for project-internal use only.

action.shortDescr: IDEPIX Generic classification of pixels (cloud, snow, ice, land, water) originating from optical sensors.
Pixel classification with LandCover AVHRR algorithm.
Pixel classification with OC-CCI algorithm (Schiller NNs).
